name: Cock Soccer
description:
Cock Soccer is a multiplayer, arcade-style 2.5d sports game with multiple customizable characters to choose from, chaotic gameplay that fuses soccer with some beat 'em up elements and maps with traps that can change the course of the match in unexpected ways!

Multiple Game Modes!

Besides the titular game mode, Cock Soccer, which is a comical take on the sport, this game also has extra modes like Cock Fight, which is a party fighter where your team has to fight against the opposing team, the more damage they take the more likely they are to be sent flying off screen and die!

Lots of Customization!

In Cock Soccer, you can customize your character's clothing color and Unlock wearable accessories and custom color variations!

In-Game Level Editor!

The built-in level editor lets you create and share custom maps to use in both local and online multiplayer modes!
